DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether MGR001 equivalent Advair Diskus administer inhalation adult asthma patient
DOC.brief_title: MGR001 / Advair Diskus Local Equivalence Study Asthma
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Key inclusion criterion include : Male female subject age ≥18 year . Females may either childbearing nonchildbearing potential Physician diagnose history asthma least 12 week prior screen prebronchodilator FEV1 6085 % screen specify visit Postbronchodilator reversibility > /=12 % Nonsmokers prior smoker history smoking within past 12 month prior screen total smoke history ≤10 packyears Subjects able discontinue asthma medication duration study maintain use albuterol require Body mass index 1840 kg/m2 inclusive Key exclusion criterion include : Presence recent history active , severe , progressive , and/or uncontrolled clinical disease , eg , poorly control Type 1 2 diabetes , seizure disorder epilepsy , cerebrovascular accident , significant cardiac conduction abnormality Respiratory condition asthma allergic rhinitis , include limited : severe nasal polyposis chronic rhinosinusitis , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , bronchiectasis , ChurgStrauss Disease , lung resection , pulmonary fibrosis ( primary secondary ) , pulmonary hypertension , cystic fibrosis , sarcoidosis History lifethreatening asthma , define history asthma episode ( ) require intubation , and/or associate hypercapnia ; respiratory arrest hypoxic seizure , asthma relate syncopal episode ( ) In patient hospitalization ( include ER visit ) asthma exacerbation within past year run period An asthma exacerbation require change asthma therapy oral/IV corticosteroid 3 month prior screen History seasonally unstable asthma season coincide subject 's participation study Use prescription nonprescription drug , include beta blocker , tricyclic antidepressant , oral decongestant , benzodiazepine , digitalis , phenothiazine , monoamine oxidase inhibitor , etc Suspected hypersensitivity study drug ( include lactose ) severe milk protein allergy Clinically significant abnormality screen ECG Evidence alcohol drug abuse dependency within 6 month prior screen
